      • squash

        public java.util.List<LineFragment> squash(java.util.List<LineFragment> oldFragments)
        Description copied from class: ComparisonManager
        compareLinesInner() comparison can produce adjustment line chunks. This method allows to squash shem. ex: "A\nB" vs "A X\nB Y" will result to two LineFragments: [0, 1) - [0, 1) and [1, 2) - [1, 2) squash will produce a single fragment: [0, 2) - [0, 2)
        Specified by:
        squash in class ComparisonManager

      • processBlocks

        public java.util.List<LineFragment> processBlocks(java.util.List<LineFragment> oldFragments,
                                                  java.lang.CharSequence text1,
                                                  java.lang.CharSequence text2,
                                                  ComparisonPolicy policy,
                                                  boolean squash,
                                                  boolean trim)
        Specified by:
        processBlocks in class ComparisonManager
        trim - - if leading/trailing LineFragments with equal contents should be skipped
        See Also:
        ComparisonManager.squash(java.util.List<com.intellij.diff.fragments.LineFragment>)
